page.title: 01GENERAL BACKGROUND.
page.content: GENERAL BACKGROUND. Our area is predominantly agricultural.It is bordered by{LITTLE {SMEATON }in the north west,a quiet village adjoining Kirk Smeaton,{WALDEN {STUBBS}a farming hamlet in the north east,a large council estate forming part of {CAMPSALL}in the south with the village of {NORTON}in the centre. {NORTON} is mostly owner occupied but does have three small blocks of council houses. The area is transversed by the{R.WENT}which separates the area into North Yorkshire and the Metropolitan County of South Yorkshire. Although mostly agricultural very few people work on the land. The chief influence on labour is the{COALMINE}at Askern,with its neighbouring Coalite plant and the six nearby power stations fired by coal.
